content.detailedDescription: Went out into my backyard early in the evening.  no moon or stars were visible yet.  in the west / northwest sky was a bright triangle / diamond shaped object.  at first i might have thought it was a blimp or a balloon.  but it sat too still in the sky.  it was so still it was almost creepy.  it gave me the weirdest feeling.  i watched it for what must have been thirty or forty-five minutes and took some pictures and video or my cheap digital camera.  i finally went back inside because i had dinner on the stove and i didn't want it to burn, but i kept peaking at it from time to time, and it was just there.  finally about an hour later when it was a little bit dimmer (but still no stars out) i could tell that this object was not just reflecting the sunlight, but was actually glowing, kinda a blue light, kinda like the blue halogen light color like are on some newer cars.  then i noticed a tiny red dot that had dropped below it for a short distance.  then very strangely the triangle slowly faded into a small dot much like the one below it.  then they both slowly just faded and vanished.  it's hard to describe.  they didn't just fly away or move off into the distance, they just faded off.  i actually had a very similar experience to this a few years ago, but didn't have a camera then.  in the pictures you can tell the diamond / triangle shape but really can't get much more detail.  sorry, but at least it's something.  it amazes me that other people saw the same thing and are describing it in almost the exact same words.  how amazing!
content.summary: Triangle / diamond shaped object with smaller orb, pics taken

content.detailedDescription: Went out into my backyard early in the evening.  no moon or stars were visible yet.  in the west / northwest sky was a bright triangle / diamond shaped object.  at first i might have thought it was a blimp or a balloon.  but it sat too still in the sky.  it was so still it was almost creepy.  it gave me the weirdest feeling.  i watched it for what must have been thirty or forty-five minutes and took some pictures and video or my cheap digital camera.  i finally went back inside because i had dinner on the stove and i didn't want it to burn, but i kept peaking at it from time to time, and it was just there.  finally about an hour later when it was a little bit dimmer (but still no stars out) i could tell that this object was not just reflecting the sunlight, but was actually glowing, kinda a blue light, kinda like the blue hallogen light color like are on some newer cars.  then i noticed a tiny red dot that had dropped below it for a short distance.  then very strangly the triangle slowly faded into a small dot much like the one below it.  then they both slowly just faded and vanished.  it's hard to describe.  they didn't just fly away or move off into the distance, they just faded off.  i actually had a very similar experience to this a few years ago, but didn't have a camera then.  in the pictures you can tell the diamond / triangle shape but really can't get much more detail.  sorry, but at least it's something.  it amazes me that other people saw the same thing and are describing it in almost the exact same words.  how amazing!
content.summary: Triangle / diamond shaped ufo with probe, pics taken

content.detailedDescription:
What i saw actually happened over a period of 7 days with me seeing the light/object 5 of those days. everyday but one, i saw this while i was driving home from work at approximately between 6:15-6:20pm. 

oct. 8th - as i was driving home, something caught my eye that was straight ahead of me in the distance that was high in the sky and maybe between 5-10 miles away. when i first saw it i thought it was just a plane reflecting the sun, but then once it all of a sudden shone very brightly and looked more like an artificially powered light, i knew that couldn't be the case. it first looked like a single circular very bright white light that then changed to 2 lights with a small space between them, and then back to a single light. it appeared to be stationary and i could not make out a frame,like maybe that of a plane. i can't be sure but it may've had the appearance of a small dark-colored tail. when it's light got very bright, it seemed to overwhelm and cover whatever other mass may've been attached to it. this was all i could see before i had to make a left turn and lost sight of it completely. i wasn't far from home at this point but didn't see the object once i got there which was actually a little closer to where i had actually seen the object in the sky.

later that same night just after 8pm or so, i went out on my balcony and looked in the same direction of the sky i'd seen the object earlier and saw a very bright whitish flickering star. after about a minute or so, i left the balcony to go eat some dinner and when i went back out to look again in about 20 minutes or so, it was gone. the sky was perfectly clear this night.

oct. 12th - while driving home at the same time, i saw the strange sphere of light again high in the sky straight ahead of me in the distance. this time it only seemed to stay as one light before it seemed to fade and then move behind a big cloud. 

oct. 13th - today i got home a little earlier from work but took my dog out for a walk around the same time i'd seen the object previously. i kept looking up intermittently to see if i'd catch something, and at one point when i looked up, i saw what looked like an object the shape of a circle with the light filling the circle and 2 small upward sloping extensions on either side of it. i only saw it for a few seconds before it disappeared behind a cloud but it appeared to be bobbing and weaving erractically as opposed to in a straight line like a plane. i never saw it again after that.

oct. 14th - on my way home from work i saw the object again when i'd reached the street where i live. it was more or less in the same position in the sky but seemed to be much bigger than before. it's mass looked dark-colored and was in the shape of cylinder or cone before it flared up in an intense, brilliant white light, almost like a burst of energy like it had done on the other days but this was the absolute brightest i'd had ever seen it so far. then the light faded back down and then i couldn't see anymore because i had to make a turn and then it was blocked by the neighboring building and i didn't see it when i took my dog out a few minutes later either. 

oct. 15 - it was very cloudy on the way home today so i didn't think i would see anything today, but through one of the very small breaks in the clouds that was more or less in the same spot i'd seen the object before, i saw what looked like a very small dark colored ball or sphere that just came to one of the cloud openings, but that never completely emerged out from the clouds. i didn't see it for more than a few seconds before i had to make another turn. i didn't see it again. 

i know this all probably sounds crazy and i can hardly believe it myself. 
keep in mind that everytime i've seen it, it's always been between 6:15-6:20pm. i live in south miami and don't know if maybe what i was seeing is actually out over the everglades since it always seems to be in the western part of the sky. i'd be interested in knowing if anyone else has seen this thing. could someone here tell me if they know what this is? i've never seen swamp gas but could it just be something like that? are there any experiments going on with new aircraft by the government in this area? i'd would very much like to hear back from someone about this. in the meantime i'll continue to watch the skies.
content.summary: Strange bright white light hovering

content.detailedDescription: I had let my pups out for potty break before going to bed, approximately 8:30 pm. they wanted to play tag. i would go to frount door and they would be at the back and vice versus. when i finally cought them at the frount door and got their attention i was rather upset at them. but before i got them inside out of the courner of my right eye i noticed a star, it was flashing red fascits .It looked like it was stationed over the gulf at about a 35 degree angle w-nw  it appeared to be red, scarlet or saphire colored with black between the fascits. like a star with multipal points on it. in the distance i also cought a glimpse of a smaller star reflecting the same blinking frequency as the one nearest to me. i almost had the feeling that the star was reflecting the anger,anoyance i had felt towards my pups at that moment. (i had had     multipal teeth extractions and did not feel well)needless to say i was taken by supprise  and frightened at the sight of the star and how it seemed to be picking up on my feelings and frustration  at that perticular moment. whether the red flashing was directed to me directly i do not know. but i feel like the reaction of the star was some how related to me at the time because the intensity of the red appeared to increase briefly as i watched it. my pups and i went inside to bed and from then on i have put them out on a tether at night for a potty break. no more tag. i was supprised ,frightened at the sight and intensity of the stars reaction to my frustration and anger at that moment. it was as if the hair on the back of my neck stood up and i had a chilling sensation. it still upsets me today. this took place over a month ago.
content.summary: Star with red (saphire red fascets ) and black between one over gulf and another in the distance nearly out of view.

content.detailedDescription: I was about to sit and down and have dinner when a friend pointed out something red in the sky. it was moving very slowly in one direction. the suddenly it stopped moving and then suddenly and quickly flew away. it was amazing! what was even more interesting is that it made no noise what so ever. i thought it could be a plane but then the planes do make noise and don't stop in the mid air. another interesting feature was that the object had bright red light and was easily visible  in the sky. it appeared to be a disc shape. i was shocked by the happening.
content.summary: A red dot in the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo over vitosha - 16 septevri 2009 
       
      with friends decided to get on the shelters' blue arrow. the closer we come to it, the clouds rose over the ridge of the vitosha mountain. 
      we reached the saddle before the shelter. before us and left a little rose "belchov top, right - the top part of" said "after his saddle, which is located hut academica. glahneha ears of silence.

"tail" like a "plane". therefore, in the first moment i thought that i plane. but the "plane" of the background of what is said is unthinkable - it is very low and too close to cliffs and mountain tops? therefore consider that it is a descending eagle shrunk wings dive towards their prey. i told her friend: "see: eagle!" and why the "eagle"? maybe i noticed the magnitude. i have often seen similar scenes in the region - and magpie-legged hawks in flight like flying to the prey, but not to this magnitude. then i changed my mind, an eagle in these places i've ever seen. it is therefore correct: "it must be a hawk!"

content.summary: Ufo over mountain vitosha - sofia

content.detailedDescription:
While driving north at 5:15 pm to 6:00 i observed a cloud that was following my car northbound on the west side of route 684. the cloud drew my attention because it did not proceed east with the other clouds formations proceeding in an easterly direction.The wheather was overcast so i became puzzled as to why the cloud was not moving over me toward the east.  the cloud followed me north on route 684 from white plains or the 287 and 684 interchange.  this was for at least 20-25 minutes. as i approached purdys the cloud emitted a craft. it came from the left front of the cloud. no winged or fans were visible.  there was no noise. the craft descended from the cloud about 50-100ft.  the cloud was approxitimately tree top + 100ft.  the craft descended and stabilized directly parallel to me as i was moving at 65 mph up 684.  it had observed me in a fixed position for about 5 minutes. 
     the craft had a cross on the front.  there was a figure of a singular figure in the upper left corner. there was no propulsion exhaust of any kind.  the kraft seem to observe me and then ascended back up backing up onto the same position in the cloud. it seemed to hook back into a position in the cloud.
     the cloud than banked west in a slow northwesterly direction. this occurred just before reaching exit 7 or the town of brewster. the cloud then took on a more difinitive shape of a square hour glass.  rectangular in the middle but round square in the front and back.  there was no noise or exhaust.
   i thought i may have been seeing some kind of illusion. after three months i saw a progrem called ufo files.  the program showed the four kinds of alien species visiting the earth.  one of the ships shown in the lower right corner was the ship i observed.  i then emailed bob byrne of ufo hunters and asked how to report this.  he advised me to report it to an agency in florida.  i did but they returned my email with a message that they could not open emails with attachments. 
    i believe this craft may be operating in the westchester croton system since i commute daily along 684 and have seen another event i have not been able to explain.  there was a light coming from the sky to the reservoir at white plains.  this was a heavy foggy night.  all i could see as i was moving north was a beam of light faintly coming from the sky. i could not see any craft.
     i have also seen the cloud formation over my house. i fell i am being observed.
content.summary: Craft observed going north on route 684

content.detailedDescription:
noticed a strange light coming in the cabing window (on the delta clearwater river) i thought it was a fire in the trees.
looked out the window to see a large orb shaped object.
orb glowing very bright light hovering over the tree line. 
the orb dimmed and i could see amber color lights near bottom of the object.
orb would get bright again, and seemed to beem lights into cabin.
looking through binos it appeared to me a metalic gold color.
no sound, but some battery opperated tools in the cabin did come on without
me turning them on. 
i was wiht my 5 year old son, and did not see anyone on the river that day.
after about 30 minutes i did hear many gunshots.
later in the night it appeared that something moved accross the deck of the cabin (tall dark, standing upright)?
30 more minutes and more gun shots.
i only had 4 beers during a 5 hour period.
this is not the first time i have seen something like this.
content.summary: Glowing orb with amber lights orb would dim and re-light

content.detailedDescription: Caught my attention because they didn't move like a airplane or helicopter. they moved back and forth. they were there for a long time. couple of times the slower one moved in a outline of a triangle. seemed like they wanted to be noticed.
content.summary: One was bigger and slower in movement, the other one was smaller and darted quicker. definitely star like.

content.detailedDescription: I am an old lady that was startled by someone trying to open my side house door yesterday night. before this happened i have had multiple ufo sightings near my son's house in death valley california.  one incident was when we were driving in the interstate and saw two triangles hovering in the sky and presumed to follow us for about an hour. my son is an evid astronomer and now believes in ufos. i personally don't but yesterday night around 10:30 p.M i was startled by a door being slammed, mydoor being shooken. i grabbed my camera and took pictures of a man near my curb. i am frighten for my life. i have called my son and he is coming to pick me up tomorrow. i did not call the police because i am afraid of something happening to me. i hear stories of men in black appearing out of nowhere but i alwasys never believed them, as of yesterday, i do now. if anyone wants to contact me, my sons email address is armandomadrigal123@hotmail.Com if you want to ask questions i will personally answer them back as soon as i can,
content.summary: Unwelcomed man in dark near in my property

content.detailedDescription: Was by myself at the community pool(i was there because i live in south florida and i wanted to enjoy the cold front coming in)when i sat down on a chair and looked straight up and saw a light brown shaped boomerang object flying across the sky for about 10 seconds.When i first saw it i had thought it was some kind of atmosheric light but i quickly realized it was not.It then blended and disappeared into the night sky. after seeing this object i continued to watch the sky for ten minutes,then another one came this time not as high in altitude as the first one. this one was the same shape except it was more gray in color and came from the same direction as the first one which was north to south. it to also completely vanished in the sky; this wasnt the first time ive seen these ufos. the first time was 4 night before this date. when i saw the object for the first time i felt really excited and felt slightly scared. the motion of the ufos werent that unusual in nature,it flew vertically but it was faster then any conventional air plane it is also able to disguise its color and visibility exceptionally.
content.summary: 2 boomerang ufos seen within 15 min.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were in a movie theater parking lot and she noticed an odd light in the sky,no visible stars,moon or anything else around,we watched the lights for a few minutes and i grabbed my binoculars from the glovebox and viewed a  upside down triangle of three lights fairly far off,the light became harder to see then a small red light emerged from the bottom and slowly descended then stopped headed back to the original light surpassing it and continuing upward then both lights slowly faded and were no longer visible.I read of a clovis nm sighting about an hour before this tonight almost the same sighting.Took a picture with my cellphone but its barely visible.No reports on the local news tonight.The sighting lasted about 15-20 minutes.
content.summary: Triangle of three lights stationary turns to two lights then disappears.

content.detailedDescription: I had just put a batch of cookies in the oven and set the timer for 10 minutes. i went to put my dog in the backyard, when i opened the door which faces east i noticed a large very bright round light in the sky, it was still daylight. i watched it for a minute then went thru the house to go to the front yard to see if anyone was outside so i could show it to them. the neighbors were just coming out of their house and the three of us watched it for a short time then they had to leave. on my way thru the house i noticed the oven timer still had a little over 3 minutes left. i stood on the back porch to look at it. the oven timer went off, i took the cookies out then went back outside. after a couple of minutes it looked liked it was changing shape, kind of like a blobby circle-ish shape. then i saw a very small red light on the bottom of it. it was only there for a few seconds, then it dropped off of the big light. as the red light fell down the bright light was getting smaller. i saw the bigger light circle around the small light. then they both went higher into the sky eastward until i couldnt see them anymore. it was 6:32 p.M.
content.summary: Started as a large bright circle.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking home and noticed in the sky this orange object moving very fast and then exited the atmosphere because it dissapeared. the object was visible for no longer than 5 seconds. 15 minutes later i noticed an atmospheric phenomenon along with my mother because i showed her. it looked like there were these lines in the sky which the one was lighting up very well when the city spotlights that pollute the sky with light hit the right angle (because the light is 4 spotlights that rotate) only for a second on each rotation of ~15 seconds does the one line light up. there was some patterns i could barely where the lines were coming from so there was a lot more i could not see. because of light pollution its not that visible except for that one that got the spotlight on when it had the right angle with the rotation. the others were too high in the air too recieve much light? its as if its the reminisce of whatever i observed and left in the atmosphere. i do not have a camera to take a picture. its slowly dissapearing but still visible 30 minutes later faintly.

should this have been reported at all or is this clearly a meteroite.
content.summary: Bright organge object enter atmoshere and leave visible evidence

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i had gone out to dinner and upon returning to our car we saw this very bright object in the north western sky. we stood outside our car for a minute or two wondering what it was and then we got in our car and drove home. we arrived home about 10 minutes later and i got out of the car and looked to see if it was still there. it was still there as it was apparrently not moving. i then ran into the house to get my binoculars and went back outside to try and get a look. i trained the binoculars on the light and was astonished to see that it was triangular shaped with big bright lights at the points. i then decided to go in and get my 8 inch reflecting telescope to try and get a better look. i got my telescope and went into the backyard and i kept an eye on it as i was setting up the scope. i heard my neighbor in his backyard so i drew his attention to it as well. as we watched it, we saw a smaller light leave the main object. from our vantage point, it seemed to drop several feet below the main object and then stop. then both objects completely faded out and disappeared before i could get my scope trained on them! the whole time i witnessed the main object, it did not seem to be moving at all. the smaller one moved at a steady rate. i can't even guess at the speed  of it. i am an avid watcher of ufo files and ufo hunters. and when i first saw this thing through my binoculars, i immediately recognized it as apparrently one of those flying triangles i had seen on these shows! it was absolutely amazing!!!
content.summary: Triangular shaped object with bright lights at the points

content.detailedDescription: My father an i were driving south on rd. 222, it was around 9:pm, i noticed a bright object out the driver side window directly east of us,i looked up and saw a round bright light falling to earth.It was as if the moon had suddenly fallin to earth.If you held a dime out at arms length this object would barely be covered by the dime, this thing was huge.I couldn't take my eyes off it.I watched as it fell, and it began to change froom a brilliant white to an amber color.Just before it vanished behind the sierras ,it seemed to be on fire, i could see flames comming from the top of it.I watched and was expecting to see and hear a large explosion,but nothing, not even a flicker did we see after that.I looked at my father and said, did you see that,dad answered yep, sure did.I listened for any radio reports ,but never heard a thing.My question to you people is, did any one else report this objet to you.Any body traveling east on highway 198 just east of visalia calif,and due north of exeter at that time, couldn,t have missed seeing this thing, it was impossible to miss it.One thing is for certain ,somthing very big hit the ground that night. i might mention, area 51 is in that general direction to where  this thig feel.
content.summary: An object fell to earth east of my house.It was as though the moon feel to earth. it was as big as a dime at arms length.

content.detailedDescription:
I had a discussion at the end of september with a co-worker who told me that a few days earlier he had been traveling south on highway 93 in nevada about 50 miles south of wells, nevada and had stopped at what is called lages junction. there were 20 or so vehicles stopped at a rest area. everyone was outside watching what appeared to be orange lights just above the horizon looking east toward utah. he told me that there were both single and double lights and that they were perfectly stationary. they would appear for a few seconds and then fade to nothing. he said at the time that his young son had gotten scared so they continued their trip to ely. at work we discussed the sighting for awhile and of course the usual kidding took place among the members of our crew. 
i am a truck driver at a open pit copper mine in ruth, nevada just east of ely, nevada. on the night of 6 october at about 9:00 pm i was traveling east onto one of the dumps where we are dumping waste rock and i was looking directly east over the schell creek range of mountains. as i looked i saw what appeared to be a very bright star just a few degrees above the horizon. i see the eastern sky at night on a regular basis and was surprised to see such a bright star at that time. i no sooner had the thought than the star blossomed into a sparkling orange sphere and brightened considerably. the size of the sphere was about half the size of a full moon in the sky. it lasted for about 5 or 6 seconds and then faded to nothing. all of the equipment on the minesite is equiped with radios and i immediately called the co-worker who had observed the event on the highway and i described what i had seen and he said that it was exactly what he had observed. i am an ex army officer and served in combat arms units in the army. i have seen just about every piece of ordinance that the military detonates and i have never seen anything like this. it was perfectly stationary. it was definitely not a flare. in fact it did not appear to be an explosive at all. it seemed to be carefully directed as it changed size and as it faded it did not act as though it was being extinguished but rather turned down like a dimming switch for a household light. i have no logical explanation for what this was. this area of nevada is very close to many military and energy department test sites including area 51 and the sites the military has in utah. i do not know but suspect that it could be connected to these facilities. other than that i cannot come up with any explanation. it was by far the strangest thing i have ever witnessed and it left me with questions i will never be able to answer. to put it in one word, "wow". i was not the only witness on my crew. an equipment operator who was working on the dump saw the phenomenon twice and another truck driver also witnessed the event once. i must tell you that one of my co-workers says it was the "great pumpkin" which is quite funny but this was a real event for which i have no explanation. i took a digital camera with a telescopic lens for the preceeding night shifts but did not observe it again but plan to continue taking the camera for a few more night shifts.
content.summary: Bright star turned into sparkling sphere

content.detailedDescription:
That night i was lying in bed watching t.V. outside the window, which is directly in front of the bed, i saw a bright white light appear above the tree line. the object didn't look like a typical airplane, because it did not blink and the light was larger and brighter than that of an airplane.
i went outside on the patio to take a look, then i saw a second object appear directly behind it. both objects look exactly the same. both had bright white lights and were globe shaped. both objects flew in perfect line with each other, one in front and one behind. they were flying to the north quite fast, faster than an airplane. they appeared to be flying quite high. i watched as they passed above me, still in formation.I did not hear any noise coming from these objects. i kept watching as they flew farther north. then i saw an airplane ahead, at a lower altitude, flying east. i watched the airplane for only a couple seconds, then i looked back at the objects, and that's when they dissappeared. their lights just faded, kind of like a light from a spark would fade and extinguish. i watched for a couple minutes to see if they would reappear, but they never did. i honestly can not say for sure what i witnessed. i can say for sure that these objects were unlike any aircraft i have ever seen before. the fact that i didn't hear any engine noise, and the speed that these things were flying at. plus, the way they flew in formation with each other, and the fact that their lights would shut off and they would fly in complete darkness kind of puzzles me. the only explaination i could think of is these were some kind of military craft, or possible sattelites. these were not shooting stars.What i've described here is exactly what i saw. i'm not looking for recongnition, just wanted to share me story with others that might believe it. since i didn't have a camera with me at the time i have no proof. anyway, if you like to contact me and give me your thoughts on this you have my e-mail.
content.summary: Two bright objects flying in formation.

content.detailedDescription: Hi, i live outside buffalo ny. i have always been interested in astronomy, space technology, and ufo's,. i have had experiences with what i believe were alien spacecraft. first time back in 1965 or 1966 when i was about 4 or 5 years old living in buffalo ny. a space craft silently hovered over my house. it was dark outside and what i saw was a saucer shaped craft about 100 feet in diameter with colored flashing lights that circled around the circumference of the craft. it made no sound. i was looking out the front window and it disappeared over the house. i told my mother but she ignored me. probably thought it was my imagination which was not the case. 43 years later i can still see the image of what i saw in the sky. while i was living there i also recall one time a sharp jolting pain in the back of my neck while i was playing outside and then i don't recall much after that. another time recently about 7 years ago i was messing around on the internet searching for area 51 when i came across a website area51.Com. it was totally blacked out. i thought this was strange. i was playing with the mouse and left clicked and dragged the curser across the screen and that opened up a screen that said if you are an alien to email us at the web address. so i played along and emailed them telling them i am an alien on earth and i am stranded. i never got a reply but about a month later i saw a blinking light over my house high in the sky that was about the size of a planet. it was not moving or making a sound. my video cameras battery was dead and by the time i set up the electric cord it was gone. it was there about 10 minutes and i wasted too much time just looking at it. i saw another strange thing over the airport around this same time period when there appeared to be a thick black line in the sky that got smaller and closed out after a few minutes. i reported this to the air force or some government agency and never heard another thing. it wasn't long later that my wife filed for a divorce. she totally changed who she used to be. it was like she didn't even know me anymore and i didn't kow here. my son has reported that strange things have occurred inside the house including a ball of light that floats around near the ceiling. i saw this myself one time when i it woke me as i was sleeping on the couch. he would also tell me he saw something looking into his bedroom window late at night. one time there was snow on the ground and he said to me dad look at those footprints. the footprints were non human and looked to be on two feet. not an animal i was familiar with. i wanted to pass these experiences along to you to see if these are similar to anyone else who has reported anything similar in the same time frame and location. also i wanted to know how i can become an investigator and if you can send me information. thanks.
content.summary: Circular or oval shaped with colored lights around the circumference. small non moving flashing light over my home. no sound to either.

content.detailedDescription:
I got home from at 6.58 pm on friday october 2009. i had dinner plans and thus had a good grip on the exact time as i was running a little late. after getting home i let the cat out and stood to lok over the bay from the houseboat we live on looking back over mill valley from just east of marin city.

i'm very familiar with satellites, planes, planets, starts, meteorites etc being an engineer who spends a lot of time researching in that field and i consider my observing skills and 20:10 vision to be strong. i can regularly observe satellites tracking regular orbital paths when they appear horizon to horizon for example. i have observed booster rockets re-enter and burn their fuel off spectacularly, launch vehicles take payloads into orbit, and many shooting stars and regular astronomical objects do their thing. i am also highly skeptical of "ufo" sightings and believe 99% of them are non events.

anyhow, as usual  was looking out over mill valley to watch the stars rise - the sun had already set and dusk was turning to night. the sky was particularly clear and there was no fog tonight. this piece of sky from sausalito to tiburon in particular has quite a lot of plane activity coming into oakland and sfo - so i often take a look at it from the front deck.

tonight i happened to notice a very faint star like object or possible a satellite tracking from south to north in a straight path. i would put it at about the same magnitude as a star observable at magnitude 0.5 to 1 - faint yet quite visible and constant.

from my observing position it was at about a 20-23 degree elevation from the true horizon, whilst facing i was directly nw.

at first nothing was unusual - it was however moving slowly and was not flashing, nor had any trace of faa lights like a plane in the distance. i stuck with it, and after it had moved perhaps 5-6 degrees across the s to n sky for about 30-40 seconds it turned to begin heading roughly ene from my observing position.

this is where it got very interesting - and hence this report. as it complete the turn from the s->n->ene it began accelerating - accelerating like nothing i had ever witnessed before. in my estimation this object crossed about 80 degrees of arc accelerating from very slow as above to covering this range in about 3 seconds, all the time accelerating.

for those interested, the path where the object tracked the longest path was between ursa major and leo minor, closer to ursa major.

i was stunned - but then as i continuously observed it - eyes glued to the object it turn again - this time in a an incredible smooth arc - all the time accelerating to head w - after which it accelerated out of sight within about 1 second and i could not locate it nor any trail nor otherwise. the speed at which it moved was simply incredible.

so, here we have what looked like a satellite accelerate radically across a huge degree of arc across the sky in three different directions, make rather drastic turns that were not those one would expect of a natural object like a meteor nor a man made object in orbit,nor multiple co-incidental objects appearing as one - this was a single object making smooth controlled turns.

i have never seen anything quite like it. i did not have my camera, and i doubt if i did i would have had time to set the exposure to capture this in time.
content.summary: Initially like a satellite, but it turned twice in a controlled arc and acclerated and vanished after crossing 120 degrees of the sky in a minute

content.detailedDescription:
I was letting the cats out after feeding time when i noticed a bright  steady red/orange light in the sky. i called my partners brother who was in the house at the time to come and see it so he was with me through out the sighting.
it was moving very slowly se to s at about 45 degrees, there was no noise as we tried to work out what it was. we had thought that it may be a chinese lantern.
 then we heard the noise of an airplane and saw its lights flashing . the airplane was heading in the direction  which looked like s to se. at this point the bright light shot away at a right angle ssw, the light seamed to move very quickly and was soon just a pin prick of light and vanished.
from turning to vanishing took about 2 seconds.

my reactions/feelings during this time was 
what was it?
how did it move so fast after being so slow? 

after wards we tried to make sense of it but came up with no conclusion.
content.summary: Red/orange bright light looked circular but cant be sure

content.detailedDescription:
Long description of sighting report it was about 10:15pm on october 16th, 2009. i was crossing the street from playing cards with our neighbors and i always look up into the night sky and i saw a royal blue light flashing from the east moving towards the west and i yelled out to my husband and neighbors to come out and see the flashing blue light. i then called yelled out for my son and called another neighbor out to see the flashing blue light. my husband called the police to report this sighting. we used two cell phones to record and also two digital cameras that recorded the object.

we continued to monitor object and at times you can clearly see a three lights that form a triangle and then it would move in erratic motion the light would dim then it would get brighter appearing as a circle.

we automatically thought it was a ufo because of the vivid royal blue color. we lost the object in the clouds.
content.summary: More pix of an object in sky

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 10:15pm tonight we were crossing the street from playing cards with our neighbors and i always look up into the night sky and i saw a royal blue light flashing from the east moving towards the west and i yelled out to my husband and neighbors to come out and see the flashing blue light.  i then called yelled out for my son and called another neighbor out to see the flashing blue light.  my husband called the police to report this sighting.  we used two cell phones to record and also two digital cameras that recorded the object.

we continued to monitor object and at times you can clearly see a three lights that form a triangle and then it would move in erratic motion the light would dim then it would get brighter appearing as a circle. 

we automatically thought it was a ufo because of the vivid royal blue color.  we lost the object in the clouds.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: An object in sky

content.detailedDescription: I went to ke'e beach at sunset, as usual, to take photographs.  right after the sun went down, the underside of the cloud cover lit up with an orange glow.  it was beautiful.  i snapped 5 photos in a row.  when i got home, i downloaded the photos in my computer and was surprised to see a disc like object in the second to last photo.  it does not appear in any of the other photos.  i just had my sensor cleaned so my photos are not impaired by dust or other particles.    i did not photoshop, saturate, or alter this photo in any way.  the only thing i did was straighten the horizon a little.  the image is grainy because the iso was set at 1600 to eliminate blur.  i have no explanation for the object in the upper right corner of the photo.  do you?
content.summary: Disc like object appeared in a photo i took at sunset.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a traffic light south-bound on macdade boulevard and was going to make a left turn onto amosland road. while i was waiting for the light to turn green, my eyes were scanning the area then i looked up at the sky. that's when i saw something i never saw before, a white, brightly lit "flying saucer". i quickly looked at traffic light to see if it had yet turned green and then refocused my eyes to where i had seen the ufo but, to my chagrin, the ufo had disappeared from sight.
content.summary: Looked up and saw a brightly lit "flying saucer"

content.detailedDescription: In the sky, there are numerous strange looking lights that are vertical and not moving. most are in the west and north, some in the southwest.
content.summary: Vertical streams of light in sky

content.detailedDescription: Along the tracks in langehorn i mountainbike ride continuosly thruout the y abreak along the tracksear i told coworkers about this when it happend but gave up on anyone taking me seriously this is not bs iwill probably never know what it was but this is what happend as iwas catching  cameabreak along thetracks and from o wind b motion as if water waslew in bending trees in acircular t his device gave off no       heat and masked its sound with the sound of a very old train iwas amazed and as my brain tried to figure out what was going on it took off down the track where there wasnone it had been tornup yearsago towards yardley pa the device was completely invisible but icould watch it move because off the downdraft it created there was aslight hissing noise that dint jive with the train sound my experience was awesome  what the heck was it
content.summary: Decended invisibly al aong a railroad track blowing over small trees and tall grass in circular wave

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i were driving around my development when something caught my eye in the sky. the sky was overcast and the sun had just set. there were 3 lights stretching about 2/5 of the way down from the clouds but still 3/5 of the way above the ground. the lights illuminated the clouds where it penetrated and the light beams had a slighty larger diameter towards the bottom of the light compared to the top. the light created a cylinder like beam with almost a root like tip at the end. it was whitish and appeared slightly faded but still very noticable(lacked intensity). i have no idea what it was. no sound, movement, change in light intensity, theyre just there, my friends dropped me off at my house and i have no idea if the lights are still out there or not. side note my dog and neighborhood dogs were strangely acting up tonight.
content.summary: Lights from sky.

content.detailedDescription: On my way to work in hayward at approximately 0700, driving southward on hayman ave. i witnessed a small cloud emerge in the sky in the south, along with this cloud there was a blue streak about the same color as a blow torch flame. i thought that it was possibly the space shuttle reentering the earths atmosphere but still am unsure what the object was.
content.summary: Blue streak and round cloud in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of september 15th, 2009 i searched youtube for ufo video's to pass the time. i came across youtube address seeingufospa and was taken back that this woman lives 40 minutes from my home. she has an open invitation for people to come and help observe these events with her.
  i knew from the beginning she had nothing to hind and i set a date to meet with her. on the evening of september 24th, 2009 we, my girlfriend (sandy) and i arrived in her general area at 7:30 p.M. i followed directions of the location to be by a google earth map location she had shown on her youtube site.
  this area is very rural, hilly, heavily wooded, dark and very quite. without knowing where to start or where to look i decided to start at a golf course i found in her general area. sandy and i walked around the golf course for a while and found nothing of interest. i decided to leave the golf course and drive around the area for awhile. 
  while driving, i called alison about 7:55 and informed her we were in the area and asked her where we should meet. at that same time i passed a car along the road and alison asked if that was me that just passed her. i replied i think so. alison said pull over, there is one directly above you. i pulled over and we jumped out of the car and found alison with her camera in her hand recording a bright, slow moving object 300 feet above us. it is now 8:01 p.M.
  i grabed my camcorder to record this event also, i was so excited i forgot to remove the lens cap and missed most of that event. my first impression was this craft is completely silent and moved in a very slow smooth line. i recall it being an amber/golden glow that pulsed. it continued in what appeared to be a straight line and moved at a slow consistent speed. this sighting lasted 40 seconds or so.
  alison, sandy and myself headed back to the golf course for awhile and found and recorded a golden orb as seen in the attached video. while recording this object it moved slowly and suddenly streaked across the sky to reappeared a mile away. we then headed to a farm field alison knew. we stood and talked for 30 minutes or so and began to see lights that appeared in the trees. they were below the tree tops staying half way between there and the ground. i recorded eight(8) separate objects that evening. while alison recorded other objects from a different location at the farm, i believe there were 12 separate sightings that evening. at the farm lands i found a very bright light in the trees, as i set up to record the light it decreased in size and intensity. this object was located on the next ridge about 1000 feet away. these recordings i took are remarkable. the image shows a round globe, white to golden in surface color with red texture/lines under the surface, with an "eye" or round design/object within the lines. this interior structure seems to be looking around. after recording it for 30 seconds or so the interior detail disappeared and there is only a whiteish/golden glow. after recording this glowing object for 15 minutes or so, noticed as i zoom out from the object it appears to pulse. as i zoom back in, the detail once again is present for a time and then disappears. this process went on several times.
  after record that object in the trees i began to notice lights in several different locations. i asked alison if there were any homes located near the lights, she said no. several of these lights seem to turn on at different times and would disappear and suddenly a light would appear in the sky above. several recording made by alison were recorded by me from a different angle/location. my camcorder is an older unit so my tapes are not as good as the high definition ones but they are real.
  some of these objects/craft seem to make a plane like noise although the noise seems to be somewhat off or "late". something about them seems unreal. most though are completely silent. i am complete impressed and totally convinced these objects/craft are nothing i have ever seen. alison kruse is completely up front and forth right. her recordings, in my professional opinion, are some of the best evidence i have ever seen. i will personally testify that her recordings and her sightings to be 100% creditable and 100% real.
  there are many more hours of recordings by alison and myself that have not yet been seen. i have returned to record more on september 30th and october 1st 2009. i also have plans to return the evenings of october 18th, 19th and 20th to help alison. i also plan to personally trek into the woods as deeply as possible and record what ever it is we find.
  i can not get the video address to go into the address bar so follow this link.
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=pkmgnnrad4c
content.summary: Pennsylvania state constable see several objects with murrysville pennsylvania woman
